snippet: Yahoo and Facebook have agreed to settle an increasingly bitter legal fight over their patent holdings, ending what could have been one of the nastier court battles in Silicon Valley in some time.
abstract: Yahoo and Facebook have agreed to settle an increasingly bitter legal fight over their patent holdings, ending what could have been one of the nastier court battles in Silicon Valley in some time.

headline.main: Yahoo and Facebook Settle Patent Lawsuits
headline.print_headline: Yahoo and Facebook Settle A Lawsuit Over Patents

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

snippet: When you hear about Apple, you mostly hear about the top executives like the late Steve Jobs, his early sidekick Steve Wozniak or the legendary designer Jony Ive. But you probably haven't heard much about Ken Segall, who worked for the ad agency r...
abstract: When you hear about Apple, you mostly hear about the top executives like the late Steve Jobs, his early sidekick Steve Wozniak or the legendary designer Jony Ive. But you probably haven't heard much about Ken Segall, who worked for the ad agency responsible for Apple's "Think Different" campaign. He has tales to tell.

headline.main: One on One: Ken Segall, the Man Who Put the 'i' in iMac

snippet: Google, Apple, Microsoft and Amazon all offer comprehensive versions of a world of hardware and software in your hands, connected to the cloud. Increasingly, the competition looks like the old tech industry conflict surrounding the personal comput...
abstract: Google, Apple, Microsoft and Amazon all offer comprehensive versions of a world of hardware and software in your hands, connected to the cloud. Increasingly, the competition looks like the old tech industry conflict surrounding the personal computer operating system.

headline.main: The Shape of the Battle for Hardware, Software and Cloud

snippet: Yahoo and Facebook agreed on Friday to settle a legal fight over their patent holdings, ending what was shaping up to be one of the nastier court battles in Silicon Valley in recent memory.     Under the terms of the pact, the two companies will e...
abstract: Yahoo and Facebook agree to settle a legal fight over their patent holdings, ending what was shaping up to be a nasty court battle; companies will expand their existing partnership, including a deeper integration of Facebook's tools into Yahoo's content pages. (M)0

headline.main: Yahoo and Facebook Settle A Lawsuit Over Patents

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED
